content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in monza the court made several decisions regarding a dispute between multiple parties the court awarded various properties including a warehouse a house with balconies and a cellar a car garage a nude area and shares of cellar rooms to the parties involved the court also ordered one party to pay a balance to two other parties and dismissed a claim for compensation by another party additionally the court declared that one party must pay an occupation indemnity to another party the court found a counterclaim for payment of an indemnity for exclusive use of certain property to be unfounded the court determined that the defendants claim for payment of the occupation indemnity was not timebarred and discussed the calculation of the amount owed the court also addressed a request for reimbursement of expenses incurred for the care of their mother stating that the expenses should be deducted from the occupation indemnity owed to two parties finally the court stated that the costs of the proceedings will be determined in the final judgment and remitted the case for further investigation and preparation of a cadastral division project
